note: Each Law Realm corresponds directly to a Law. This system defines realms used for cultivation, law comprehension, and spiritual progression.

void_status.description: Void is no longer a standalone law or realm.
void_status.integration: Now treated as a subcategory under the Neutral law and fully compatible with Neutral-aligned techniques, soul forms, and cultivators.

access_methods: Story-based entry (e.g., vision quests or divine resonance)
effects: Enhanced cultivation speed for aligned techniques
Resonance with techniques and spiritual roots
Potential for divine inheritance or legacy knowledge

integration_notes.technique_alignment: Techniques matching a realm's law receive enhanced effectiveness while cultivated inside the corresponding Law Realm.
integration_notes.spiritual_pathways: Law Realms may define spiritual paths toward godhood or unique breakthroughs.
